actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to permit the discharge of alum and alum sludge under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to prohibit the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency from establishing any effluent limitation with regard to the discharge of alum or alum sludge.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to permit the discharge of alum and alum sludge under such Act.
